entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
